entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as proudly talking about Thestrals. He is described as having a herd of them at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as giving a soft "oh!" of comprehension at Harry's shoulder.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is not explicitly mentioned in the text but his presence is inferred by Hermione's reaction to Hagrid's statement.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned as interrupting Hagrid and expressing her alarm about Thestrals.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as having told Parvati that Thestrals bring horrible misfortune on people who see them.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as taking a long journey and not wanting to Apparate.

relationships.description: Hagrid has a herd of Thestrals at Hogwarts.
Parvati feels something near her when a Thestral passes close to her.
